scriptLines: SelectRequiredFields split(indicator == "Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k" || indicator == "Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k",
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
